title: Part 2: Devotional Practices (2015-07-01)
description:
Part 2: Devotional Practices (2015-07-01) - The sacred feminine expresses the realization of our belonging, our innate interdependence with all of life. These two classes explores inner practices that help us open to our longing to belong, and awaken the power of prayer.

Please support this podcast by donating at www.tarabrach.com. Your donations allow us to continue to freely offer the teachings!
